meanings.definition: The quality or state of being miserly.
meanings.sent1: Her miserlinesses made it difficult for her to enjoy even the smallest luxuries.
meanings.sent2: His miserlinesses were evident in the way he counted every penny.
meanings.sent3: Despite his miserlinesses, he couldn't resist buying a cup of coffee every morning.
meanings.sent4: The miserlinesses of the old man were like a heavy cloak, weighing him down.
meanings.sent5: The town gossips whispered about her miserlinesses, painting her as a penny-pincher.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being stingy or excessively frugal.
meanings.sent1: The miserlinesses of the landlord were evident in the poorly maintained building.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her miserlinesses, always looking for ways to save money.
meanings.sent3: His miserlinesses reached new heights when he started reusing tea bags.
meanings.sent4: The miserlinesses of the company led to a decrease in employee morale.
meanings.sent5: The miserlinesses of the chef resulted in small portion sizes that left customers hungry.
